did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary
did.unittitle: Act of the General Assembly 27 October 1748.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Before publishing, permission must be obtained from the Manuscripts and Rare Books Librarian.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Act passed by the General Assembly, 27 October 1748., Accession # 1997.16, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

altformavail.head: Alternative Form Available
altformavail.p: Copy of pp. 408-409, 426-431 of The Statute at Large; Being a Collection of all the Laws of Virginia. . .Volume V. By William Waller Hening. (Richmond, 1819).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Manuscript copy of an Act passed by the General Assembly, 27 October 1748, relating to land titles. Includes signature of Mary Hazzard.
